alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 28 at 9:46PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of North Mississippi, including the following counties, Chickasaw, Itawamba and Monroe. * WHEN...Until 100 AM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 946 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Amory, Aberdeen, Smithville, New Wren, Prairie, Trebloc, Hatley, Woodland, Gattman, Becker, East Aberdeen, Bigbee, Wren, Quincy, Binford, New Hamilton, Wise Gap, Greenwood Springs, Athens and Parham. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
